title: NotificationTemplate
description: A NotificationTemplate defines the default formatting template for notifications of a specific entity type.

id.description: Unique identifier of this template instance.

name.description: Name for the notification template (e.g., 'Default Table Template', 'Custom Pipeline Alerts').

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this template.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Fully qualified name for the template.

description.description: Description of the template purpose and usage.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the template.

impersonatedBy.description: Bot user that performed the action on behalf of the actual user.

templateSubject.description: Handlebars template for the email subject line with placeholders.

templateBody.description: Handlebars HTML template body with placeholders.

provider.description: Provider of the template. System templates are pre-loaded and cannot be deleted. User templates are created by users and can be deleted.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the template.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the template has been soft deleted.

isModifiedFromDefault.description: Indicates if this system template has been modified from its default version. Only applicable to system templates.
